questions: John spent $15.75 on lunch and $8.95 on a movie. How much did he spend in total?
A rectangular garden has a length of 7.25 meters and a width of 4.5 meters. What is its area?
If a bookshelf has 5 shelves, and each shelf can hold 2.75 kg of books, how much weight can the entire bookshelf hold?
A car travels at a speed of 55.5 km/h. How far will it travel in 2.5 hours?
If the ratio of boys to girls in a class is 3:5, and there are 24 students in total, how many boys are there?
If the cost of 5 pens is ₹40, what is the cost of 8 pens?
